params.query: ("Trump health" OR "Trump hospitalized" OR "Trump medical" OR "Donald Trump health" OR "Trump medical records")

searches_planned.reason: Casts a wide net for the most recent posts mentioning Trumps health and related phrases. 'Latest' will surface breaking reports, rumors, or official statements that need verification and will produce tweet IDs and accounts to analyze further.

Checks whether Trumps health is a national-level trending topic, which helps prioritize resources (if trending, social-media signals and volume matter). Also helps surface related hashtags or phrases to refine further searches.

Retrieves the subjects own recent posts (official statements or denials) so we can compare public claims to media reports and identify primary-source assertions to analyze (tweet IDs, timestamps). If account is inactive/suspended, results will quickly indicate need to pivot to other official channels.

Maps affiliations (campaign staff, medical team, spokespeople, institutions) tied to the subject. Identifying affiliated accounts enables targeted verification (checkfollow/checkretweet) and identifies likely sources of official medical information or coordinated messaging.
